item.description:
Hi everyone, get ready for a SATURDAY meetup at a brand new in-door park called Moms and Paws in Cambridge!

Moms and Paws charges $7 per dog to play, or $10 for two. If we have more than five frenchies RSVP, the price will go down to $5 per dog.

Your frenchie's canine brothers, sisters and friends are more than welcome to join us at Moms and Paws! Please abide by the weight/size limits they post.

From Moms and Paws: Vaccinations and veterinary paper work on Rabies and DHLP (distemper hepatitis leptorosis parvovirus) are required. Recommended vaccinations are parvo and bordetella. When you come please bring a current list of your dogs vaccinations and your veterinary info (name and phone number). We want to make sure all our dogs are safe :)

For more info, checkout this post: http://www.meetup.com/BostonFrenchBulldogs/messages/boards/thread/19439002

Thanks so much, we can't wait to see you! Letitia & Clyde

group.name: The Boston French Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: February French Bulldog Meetup
